content: Get information about the source app repository (URL/name)
Analyze current template structure and Convex setup
Clone/import the source app without damaging original
Analyze Supabase schema and features in source app
Map Supabase schema to Convex schema
Create Convex schema for all Consentual tables
Migrate authentication from Supabase to Convex
Create date mode functions (sessions, consent, emergency)
Migrate database queries and mutations
Implement file storage alternative for Convex
Update environment variables and configuration
Set up Clerk JWT template for Convex
Initialize Convex and push schema
Copy all Consentual frontend components
Copy styles and assets from Consentual
Create hooks to replace Supabase with Convex
Copy all Consentual pages and routes
Create React Router v7 route files
Update AuthContext to use Clerk
Update Supabase imports in components
Migrate frontend components to use Convex hooks
Migrate real-time subscriptions to Convex
Test the migrated app functionality
